overview.summary: The Field Slicer module reduces the dimension of a topologically regular field by 1 dimension.

net.title: GetSliceFromLatVol Regression Test
net.p: Read in the utah torso model and display it's boundary for reference. Then resample the model using the SampleLattice module to fit it to a regular grid which is then visualized as a point cloud. Finally the GetSliceFromLatVol module is used to select an arbitrary plane from the sampled lattice. This plane is then drawn using larger dots and compared with the underlying mesh to determine that it was selected correctly.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/NewField/GetSliceFromLatVol.net.

net.title: GetSliceFromLatVol-testimgi Regression Test
net.p: Create a sample field, populate it with a nice synthetic data set, and move it to an arbitrary non-identity transformation in space. Then GetSliceFromLatVol is used to extract a particular plane or scanline from the field and the result is visualized for comparison purposes.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/NewField/GetSliceFromLatVol-testimgi.net.
